item.description: Always insightful discussion of how practicing the Law of Attraction in our lives can manifest great things in our lives. All who attend leave inspired that it really works! It doesn't matter if you've been practicing for 20 years or were just introduced to the concept and want to hear more. Suggested subject matter ... The Secret (thesecret.tv); Excuse Me, Your Life is Waiting; Ask and It is Given; and Celestine Prophecy (book or DVD).
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the back room (around corner near restrooms)!

group.name: The North-of-Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: North-of-Boston Daytime Meetup
